r.s: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.d: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.n: * Changed rule "toc" so that it properly caputres formatting in headings for the table of contents * Changed rule "codeblock" to "code", it no longer colorizes * Added rule "phpcode", it acts like "code" and it colorizes * Added rule "phplookup", it links function names to the php.net manual * Added new rule "revise" to mark text for insert/delete revisions * Renamed a number of rules to be shorter or more descriptive * Updated HomePage and SamplePage with new rules * Added docs/TextWikiProposal (the initial PEAR proposal text, modified)
